name: TRANSAMERICA COMPANIES (FORMLY AEGON)
sampleDescriptions: Legislation impacting retirement plans; multiple employer plans. (H.R. 5282, S. 2526, Retirement Enhancement and Savings Act of 2018).
Modify current law to permit employers to offer TRICARE supplemental coverage.
Tax issues related to insurance; tax reform issues; retirement issues in tax. H.R. 5282, S. 2526, Retirement Enhancement and Savings Act of 2018.
